message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $17,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you reaching out. $17,000 is a bit higher than my budget.  I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget, but the product is worth significantly more to me. Could you meet me halfway at $13,500?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. $13,500 is still a bit out of my range.  I'm willing to go up to $11,000. This would be a fair price for both of us, as you'd still get a good deal, and I'd be able to stay within my budget.
